sections.body:
Before Combat The druid casts shambler once per week and casts ironwood on his armor every 19 days.

During Combat The druid sends shambling mounds into combat, casts mass cat's grace, wild shapes into a Huge fire elemental, and moves in to flank.
sections.name: TACTICS

sections.body: These druids dwell in the most explosive spots in the world.

special_qualities: a thousand faces, nature bond (Fire domain), nature sense, orc blood, timeless body, trackless step, weapon familiarity, wild empathy +18, woodland stride
name: Rage Flame
